Description / Notes: A GABAergic neuron that expresses Lamp5. (IL)
A distinct Lamp5 type also expressing the MGE marker Lhx6
A very distinct Sst type expressing the gene Chodl in mouse; the only reported long-range projecting GABAergic type
A very distinct GABAergic type expressing the gene Meis2 in mouse
Intratelencephalic: a specific cell type expressing the gene Car3 in mouse
Extratelencephalic; also known as CF (corticofugal)- PT (pyramidal tract)- or SC (subcortical)
Sometimes abbreviated “NN”- also referred to as “glia” in cases when no non-neuronal and non-glial cell types are included
Cells other than neurons (astrocytes - OPCs - or oligodendrocytes - also referred to as non-neural brain cell
